// Pivot 0, 0
int Bola[32] = {
	12, 0,
	17, 0,
	23, 1,
	27, 4,
	30, 10,
	30, 18,
	27, 23,
	23, 27,
	17, 29,
	12, 29,
	6, 27,
	2, 22,
	0, 16,
	1, 8,
	4, 3,
	9, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Bola[32] = {
	0.400000f, 0.000000f,
	0.566667f, 0.000000f,
	0.766667f, 0.034483f,
	0.900000f, 0.137931f,
	1.000000f, 0.344828f,
	1.000000f, 0.620690f,
	0.900000f, 0.793103f,
	0.766667f, 0.931035f,
	0.566667f, 1.000000f,
	0.400000f, 1.000000f,
	0.200000f, 0.931035f,
	0.066667f, 0.758621f,
	0.000000f, 0.551724f,
